Containers.Name: Microsoft SQL Server 2019
Containers.Description: An Unraid template for official MS release on DockerHub.[br] See here for details: https://hub.docker.com/_/microsoft-mssql-server
Containers.Overview: An Unraid template for official MS release on DockerHub.[br] See here for details: https://hub.docker.com/_/microsoft-mssql-server

Config.Name: Accept EULA
Config.Description: Set to 'Y' to confirm your acceptance of the End-User Licensing Agreement. See 'License' section here https://hub.docker.com/_/microsoft-mssql-server for details.

Config.Name: SA Password
Config.Description: Set a password for the sysadmin account, must meet password strength rules to work: This password needs to include at least 8 characters of at least three of these four categories: uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers and non-alphanumeric symbols. See 'Environment Variables' section here https://hub.docker.com/_/microsoft-mssql-server for details.

Config.Name: Product Version ID
Config.Description: 'the Product ID (PID) or Edition that the container will run with' - allowed values: Developer/Express/Standard/Enterprise/EnterpriseCore. See 'Environment Variables' section here https://hub.docker.com/_/microsoft-mssql-server for details.

Config.Name: Enable SQL Server Agent
Config.Description: Set to true/false to enable/disable SQL Server Agent.
